extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Programming Languages in computer program and J.A.R.V.I.S. (Just A Rather Very Intelligent System) in Iron Man have structured with syntax and rules
extended_metaphor.programming_languages: Programming languages are structured with syntax and rules to provide a precise way to communicate instructions to the computer, ensuring that tasks are executed accurately and efficiently.
extended_metaphor.j.a.r.v.i.s._(just_a_rather_very_intelli: Similarly, J.A.R.V.I.S. in Iron Man operates with structured rules and syntax to process and execute commands, enabling Tony Stark to communicate effectively with the AI system.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Programming Languages in computer program and J.A.R.V.I.S. (Just A Rather Very Intelligent System) in Iron Man use of standardized symbols and conventions
extended_metaphor.programming_languages: Standardized symbols and conventions in programming languages allow developers to convey complex information to the computer system in a consistent and understandable way.
extended_metaphor.j.a.r.v.i.s._(just_a_rather_very_intelli: In the case of J.A.R.V.I.S., Iron Man relies on standardized symbols and conventions to communicate with the intelligent system, ensuring efficient and effective interactions for task completion.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Programming Languages in computer program and J.A.R.V.I.S. (Just A Rather Very Intelligent System) in Iron Man rely on a consistent set of symbols and commands
extended_metaphor.programming_languages: Programming languages rely on a consistent set of symbols and commands to convey logical sequences of actions, enabling developers to create algorithms and programs with predictable outcomes.
extended_metaphor.j.a.r.v.i.s._(just_a_rather_very_intelli: Similarly, J.A.R.V.I.S. in Iron Man depends on a consistent set of symbols and commands to process and perform actions as instructed by Tony Stark, ensuring accurate and efficient execution of tasks.
